trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The table is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the table moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.
